tp:docstring.p: An interface for channels that can be made conceptually part of a Conference.DRAFT, and can then be detached from that conference.

tp:rationale.p: This interface addresses part of freedesktop.org bug #24906 (GSM-compatible conference calls). GSM is currently the only protocol known to implement this; PBXs might implement it too.

tp:docstring.p: Request that this channel is removed from any Conference.DRAFT of which it is a part.

This implies that the media streams within the conference are put on hold and the media streams within the member channel leaving the conference are unheld. [FIXME: or, maybe it'd be less surprising if it didn't do this?]

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Errors.InvalidArgument
tp:error.tp:docstring: This channel isn't in a conference.

tp:error.name: org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Errors.NotAvailable
tp:error.tp:docstring: This channel is in a conference but can't currently be split away from it.
